name: SwordsGirl Harumi - Adult Only
description:
Story

A once quiet town. There lived a brave female warrior called Swordsman Harumi. Harumi enjoyed wielding her sword and protecting peace and justice. One day, the village is attacked by a strange creature in the quiet of the night.

The villagers trembled in fear and tried to protect themselves by closing windows and locking doors, but the strange creatures kept coming. They were terrible monsters that even swordsman Harumi had never seen before. It was attacking the village with its eyes wandering around looking for its prey.

Harumi witnessed this situation, and she felt that it was her duty to save the people of her village. She quickly swings her sword and tries to stop the large army of strange creatures, but it is not enough.

Harumi tries to uncover the origins of strange creatures around town. They gain valuable information from an unknown wizard. Based on that information, she realized she had to go in search of the demon, the conqueror of the monstrous creatures.

Harumi sets out on a long journey to find the devil's scribe, overcoming her hardships and hardships. Their adventure evolves into a story of finding light in the darkness and heading towards a decisive battle with the devil to restore hope to the town.

Game introduction: Swordsman Harumi's Adventure - Go through the darkness!

Folks, darkness is sweeping the world. The village is devastated by monster attacks, and the fate of the enchanted prince, the last hope, remains unclear. And at the edge of this darkness, the source of evil is rising from the Abyss Dark Hollow.

This is where the brave swordsman Harumi appears. She heads to the Land of Darkness to save the world, trying to overcome unknown areas and monsters. But that's not all. She sets out to rescue the enchanted prince and bring peace back to the village.

“Swordsman Harumi’s Adventure” is a bold adventure RPG where emotion, action, and puzzles coexist. Players will experience thrilling battles in various locations, undertake exciting quests, and participate in a journey into the dark unknown.

Game Features:

Various stages and boss battles that will make your heart race
Various areas with different environments and puzzles
Captivating story and rich characters
Powerful weapons and attack items that unleash unknown powers
Your courage and strategy will change the world. Break through the darkness with Swordsman Harumi and bring light back to this world!
